---
title: "QR Code Generator"
---

```{r}
#| eval: false

install.packages("qrcode")
```

```{r}
library(qrcode)
```

# Cytometry In R Google Form
```{r}
code <- qr_code("https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScPK4V_WNSgQvZNq7aIHpoiX8pi3kiuCfI0Tp7hQkVJS3HPtQ/viewform")

generate_svg(code, filename = "images/CytometryInR_Google.svg")
plot(code)
```

# Cytometry In R Website
```{r}
code <- qr_code("https://umgccfcss.github.io/CytometryInR/")

generate_svg(code, filename = "images/CytometryInR_Website.svg")
plot(code)
```
